column5: Italian inspired, full kitchen, living, dining areas. Perfect place to celebrate graduation, A&M wins! Everything needed for a luxurious stay. Spacious, beautifully appointed. Large outdoor deck with lots of seating. Beautifully landscaped! We are available for extended stays, both weekly and 28 day. Please contact the host for details. In addition, we are available for special events. If you plan on more than 20 people, advance arrangements are required. * Please read the entire description *
